dict.string: SaviPets uses your calendar access to help schedule pet visits and manage bookings smoothly.
SaviPets needs location access to track pet sitters during visits and ensure pet safety. This allows clients to see when sitters arrive and leave.
SaviPets requires "Always Allow" location access for pet sitters to track visits even when the app is in the background. This ensures continuous monitoring during pet care sessions.
